objects.text:
• 9 Hours Cooling Retention
• Automatic Defrost System
• Adjustable Shelves
• Energy Efficient Design

product_details.name: Whirlpool 184 L 2 Star Direct-Cool Single Door Refrigerator (205 WDE CLS 2S SAPPHIRE BLUE-Z, Blue,2023 Model)
product_details.description:
- Brand: Whirlpool.
- Model: 205 WDE CLS 2S.
- Capacity: 184 litres.
- Annual Energy Consumption: 190 Kilowatt Hours Per Year.
- Refrigerator Fresh Food Capacity: 169.2 litres.
- Freezer Capacity: 14.3 Litres.
- Bottle Count: 4.
- Installation Type: Freestanding.
- Part Number: 205 WDE CLS 2S.
- Form Factor: Stand Alone.
- Special Features: Adjustable Shelves.
- Colour: SAPPHIRE BLUE-Z.
- Voltage: 220.
- Wattage: 205 Watts.
- Number of Drawers: 4.
- Defrost System: Automatic.
- Door Orientation: Left.
- Door Material: Stainless Steel.
- Shelf Type: Wire.
- Number of Shelves: 2.
- Certification: Energy Rating.
- Material: Stainless Steel.
- Batteries Required: No.
- Country of Origin: India.
- Importer: Whirlpool of India Ltd.
- Plot No.
- A-4, MIDC Ranjangaon,Taluka Shirur, Dist: Pune, Maharashtra 412220, India, Email - helpdeskindia@whirlpool.com ; Toll Free - 1800 208 1800.
- Item Weight: 33 kg 400 g.
- Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 60.5 x 53.5 x 118.8 Centimeters.
- Net Quantity: 1 count.
- Generic Name: Refrigerator.

banner_details:
The banner is a promotional design featuring a bold and modern layout, primarily divided vertically into two contrasting color blocks. On the left, key promotional text appears through text layers such as `heading`, `subheading`, `product_name_1`, and `product_name_2`, highlighting an early discount offer. `tagline_1` and `tagline_2` emphasize urgency. At the center, a prominent product image (`product_image`) is placed within a darker section on the right. Below the features listed using `description`, the price (`price`) stands out in large font followed by a call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with overlaying text (`cta`). The visual structure enhances readability and conversion.

**Color Palette:**
- Maroon: #3e2021
- Deep Brown: #3c2b2c
- Black: #000000
- Cream White: #f4ebdc
- Bold Red: #d72300
- Product Blue: #2a2d85
product_color: The product image features a deep, rich navy blue (**#0D0F6B**) as the primary color, encapsulating the fridge’s modern and sleek design. This shade is subtly gradiented with hints of muted indigo-blue on the edges (**#51548B**), enhancing depth while highlighting the curvature of the product. Crisp white (**#FFFFFF**) is used strategically for the text and icons, standing out sharply against the dark background to emphasize key features like “9 HOURS COOLING RETENTION.” The smooth color transition and contrast create a visually appealing balance, ideal for a high-impact advertisement banner. Accent tones like steel grey (**#7A7C89**) can be used for complementary elements.
